english.segment1: Only the losers win. They've got nothing to prove. They'll leave the world with nothing to lose
english.segment2: You can laugh at the weirdos now. Wait till wrongs are right. They'll be the ones with nothing to hide
english.segment3: Cause Ive been thinking, thinking. I've got a plan to lose it all. I've got a contract pending on eternity. If I haven't already given it away. I've got a plan to lose it all
english.segment4: I've been the burnout kid. I've been the idiot. I'll turn the other cheek to be hit
english.segment5: You can take what you want from me. Empty me till Im depleted. I'll be around if Im ever needed
english.segment6: 'Cause I've been thinking, thinking. I've got a plan to lose it all. I've got a contract pending on eternity. If I haven't already given it away. I've got a plan to lose it all
english.segment7: I wrote this song for you. To show how Im selling out. I'll take the benefit of the doubt
english.segment8: Because I've been thinking, thinking. I've got a plan to lose it all. I've got a contract pending on eternity. If I haven't already given it away. I've got a plan to lose it all. I've got a plan to lose it all. I've got a plan to lose it all.
